text: Buttenwiesen () is a municipality in the district of Dillingen in Bavaria in Germany. == Community structure == The comune Buttenwiesen belongs to the region of Augsburg. The community contains the main town Buttenwiesen and the municipality parts Frauenstetten, Lauterbach, Oberthürheim, Pfaffenhofen an der Zusam, Unterthürheim and Wortelstetten. ==References== Category:Dillingen (district)
title: Buttenwiesen
